
create-account-alias
********************


DESCRIPTION
===========

This action creates an alias for your AWS account. For information
about using an AWS account alias, see Using an Alias for Your AWS
Account ID in *Using AWS Identity and Access Management* .


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws iam create-account-alias
     --account-alias <value>


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--account-alias"  (string)
   Name of the account alias to create.


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

None
